SELECT TEMP.ID AS userId, COUNT(T.ID) AS num FROM (SELECT u.`ID` FROM sys_user u LEFT JOIN SYS_ROLE_USER RU ON u.`ID` = ru.`TARGET_ID` LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON ru.`ROLE_ID` = r.`ID` LEFT JOIN BIZ_RULE_CONF rc ON r.`ROLE_CODE` = rc.`BREF_ID` WHERE u.`VALIDATE_STATE` = '1' AND RU.VALIDATE_STATE = '1' AND RC.RULE_IS_DETAIL = '1' AND RC.RULE_TYPE = '2' AND RC.RULE_CODE = #{ruleCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND RC.AREF_ID = #{arefId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) TEMP LEFT JOIN JBPM4_TASK T ON TEMP.ID = T.ID AND EXISTS (SELECT PRO_INSTANCE_ID FROM JBPM4_BIZ_TAB WHERE BIZ_TYPE = #{bizType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND PRO_INSTANCE_ID = t.PRO_INSTANCE_ID) GROUP BY TEMP.ID ORDER BY NUM
